title: So I got accepted into PBE but the Email is 2 years old.

replies.body: It's not you, it's the site!  It's currently down for extended maintenance per the [PBE status page](http://status.pbe.leagueoflegends.com/#pbe).  I don't have nay ETAs on when it will be back up, but bookmark it to stay up to date.   Hope that clears things up!
Thanks for the replying and the info!
i want going to PBE not play ranks Porocles.im play normal and vs bot.im so chicken not horoned play ranks.play top lane so fail and feed my team blame me anytime@@
